item.title: Counters? Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @Delta2 Delta_
item.description:
@Delta2 wrote:

public void vengspell() {
if(vengCount == 0) {
vengCount += 1;
sendMessage(“Get ready to hurt someone!! Oooo! This is gonna be fun!”);
}else if(vengCount == 1) {
sendMessage(“Its only gonna happen once there sport.”);
}
}

Remove the client. part off vengCount += 1;?

item.title: Counters? Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @_Pure_Pwnage ~!Pure Pwnage!~
item.description:
@_Pure_Pwnage wrote:

its now working, but it hurts the person who did the vengeance… not cool. heres the code. PS thanks delta.

public void veng() {
client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
                            if(vengCount == 1) {

                                        player.hitDiff = hitDiff / 4;
                                        player.hitUpdateRequired = true;
                                        player.updateRequired = true;
                                        player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			   vengCount = 0;

                            }
}

I might be able to fix t on my own… but i only have a couple hours… . so please fix my awful code!
